description: LotusAssist IT Support Issue Taxonomy - Categories and sub-categories for AI classification

categories.label: Email & Calendar
categories.description: Outlook, email delivery, calendar, shared mailboxes, contacts

sub_categories.label: Outlook version confusion
sub_categories.description: User on wrong version of Outlook (Classic vs New), features missing, UI looks different

sub_categories.label: Repeated password prompts
sub_categories.description: Outlook keeps asking for password repeatedly, usually after MFA setup or password change

sub_categories.label: Shared mailbox access
sub_categories.description: Cannot access a shared mailbox, shared mailbox not appearing, permissions issue

sub_categories.label: Calendar sync issues
sub_categories.description: Calendar invites not syncing, meetings not appearing, double bookings

sub_categories.label: Outlook search broken
sub_categories.description: Search not returning results, search slow, can't find emails

sub_categories.label: Email send/receive failure
sub_categories.description: Emails stuck in outbox, not receiving emails, delivery failures, bounced emails

sub_categories.label: Out-of-office issues
sub_categories.description: Auto-reply not working, OOO not turning on/off, wrong message sending

sub_categories.label: Outlook profile corruption
sub_categories.description: Outlook won't open, crashes on startup, profile error messages

sub_categories.label: Attachment problems
sub_categories.description: Can't attach files, attachment too large, can't open received attachments

categories.label: Files & Storage
categories.description: OneDrive, file sync, storage, SharePoint document libraries, file access

sub_categories.label: OneDrive sync issues
sub_categories.description: OneDrive not syncing, sync pending, stuck syncing, red X or warning icons

sub_categories.label: Desktop/Documents folder moved
sub_categories.description: Known Folder Move - user's Desktop or Documents moved to OneDrive unexpectedly

sub_categories.label: File conflicts / duplicates
sub_categories.description: Duplicate files appearing, sync conflicts, multiple versions of same file

sub_categories.label: Storage full
sub_categories.description: OneDrive storage full, can't save files, storage quota exceeded

sub_categories.label: Shared file access
sub_categories.description: Can't access shared files or SharePoint documents, permission denied

sub_categories.label: OneDrive icon missing
sub_categories.description: OneDrive not running, cloud icon gone from taskbar, OneDrive not starting

sub_categories.label: Files only in cloud / offline access
sub_categories.description: Files showing as cloud-only, can't open files without internet, need files available offline

sub_categories.label: Outlook data file conflict with OneDrive
sub_categories.description: OneDrive trying to sync .ost or .pst files, causing Outlook or sync errors

categories.label: Software & Apps
categories.description: Office apps, version issues, updates, activation, browser, third-party software

sub_categories.label: Wrong Office version (32/64-bit)
sub_categories.description: 32-bit Office installed instead of 64-bit or vice versa, compatibility issues with add-ins

sub_categories.label: Outlook Classic vs New Outlook
sub_categories.description: Cross-reference with EM-01. User needs to switch between Outlook versions.

sub_categories.label: Office not updating
sub_categories.description: Office apps stuck on old version, won't update, update channel mismatch

sub_categories.label: Office activation errors
sub_categories.description: Office showing as unlicensed, activation failed, product key issues

sub_categories.label: Apps crashing after update
sub_categories.description: Office apps or other software crashing or not opening after a recent update

sub_categories.label: Teams app issues
sub_categories.description: Teams desktop app not opening, Teams web vs app confusion, Teams cache issues

sub_categories.label: Browser too old / compatibility
sub_categories.description: Web apps not loading properly due to outdated browser, site compatibility issues

categories.label: Login & Account Access
categories.description: Passwords, MFA, account lockouts, sign-in problems, SSO, conditional access

sub_categories.label: Forgotten password
sub_categories.description: User can't remember their password and needs to reset it

sub_categories.label: MFA / Authenticator issues
sub_categories.description: New phone, lost authenticator app, can't receive verification codes, MFA setup problems

sub_categories.label: Account locked out
sub_categories.description: Account disabled or locked after too many failed sign-in attempts

sub_categories.label: Cached credentials after password change
sub_categories.description: Apps still using old password after a change, need to sign in again everywhere

sub_categories.label: SSO failures for third-party apps
sub_categories.description: Single sign-on not working for apps that normally use Microsoft login

sub_categories.label: Blocked by conditional access
sub_categories.description: Access blocked when trying to use M365 from a personal or unmanaged device

categories.label: Teams & Meetings
categories.description: Microsoft Teams calls, meetings, chat, notifications, performance

sub_categories.label: Audio/video not working
sub_categories.description: No sound, microphone not working, camera not detected in Teams meetings

sub_categories.label: Screen sharing fails
sub_categories.description: Can't share screen in Teams, screen share shows black, permission issues

sub_categories.label: Notifications missing
sub_categories.description: Not getting Teams notifications, chat alerts not appearing, missed messages

sub_categories.label: Can't join meeting
sub_categories.description: Meeting link not working, can't join from calendar, meeting room issues

sub_categories.label: Chat not syncing
sub_categories.description: Teams messages missing, chat not loading, messages appearing delayed

sub_categories.label: Teams performance
sub_categories.description: Teams running slow, freezing, high CPU/memory usage

sub_categories.label: Voicemail / call queue
sub_categories.description: Voicemail not working, call queue issues, phone system problems

categories.label: Device & Hardware
categories.description: Laptops, desktops, printers, monitors, peripherals, firmware, performance

sub_categories.label: Printer issues
sub_categories.description: Can't print, printer not found, print jobs stuck, wrong printer selected

sub_categories.label: Display/monitor issues
sub_categories.description: External monitor not working, resolution wrong, multiple monitor setup, screen flickering

sub_categories.label: Laptop/desktop slow
sub_categories.description: Device running slowly, taking long to start up, general poor performance

sub_categories.label: Bluetooth/WiFi hardware
sub_categories.description: Bluetooth not pairing, WiFi adapter not working, wireless connectivity hardware issues

sub_categories.label: USB devices not recognised
sub_categories.description: USB devices not detected, USB drives not showing, peripheral not recognised

sub_categories.label: Won't boot / blue screen
sub_categories.description: Device won't turn on, blue screen of death, crash on startup, boot failure

sub_categories.label: Firmware / driver updates needed
sub_categories.description: Device needs firmware update, driver issues, hardware not working after Windows update

categories.label: Security Concern
categories.description: Phishing, suspicious activity, data breach, security incidents. ALWAYS ESCALATE IMMEDIATELY.

sub_categories.label: Phishing / suspicious email
sub_categories.description: User received a suspicious or phishing email

sub_categories.label: Clicked a bad link
sub_categories.description: User clicked on a suspicious link or opened a suspicious attachment

sub_categories.label: Data breach concern
sub_categories.description: Suspected data breach, information may have been exposed or leaked

sub_categories.label: Security incident report
sub_categories.description: Suspected hacking, unauthorised access, unknown activity on account

sub_categories.label: Blocked website (legitimate need)
sub_categories.description: A website the user needs is blocked by security filters

categories.label: New Staff / Access Requests
categories.description: User provisioning, access changes, software installs, offboarding. All require IT admin action.

sub_categories.label: New staff setup
sub_categories.description: New employee needs account creation, device setup, and access provisioning

sub_categories.label: Access to shared resource
sub_categories.description: Need to be added to a shared mailbox, Teams channel, SharePoint site, or shared drive

sub_categories.label: Software installation request
sub_categories.description: User needs software installed that isn't available through Company Portal or self-service

sub_categories.label: License / feature missing
sub_categories.description: A feature or app isn't available, likely a licensing issue

sub_categories.label: VPN access request
sub_categories.description: User needs VPN set up or reconfigured for remote access

sub_categories.label: Departing staff
sub_categories.description: Staff member leaving, account needs to be deactivated, data preserved

categories.label: Internet & Connectivity
categories.description: Internet access, WiFi, VPN, network connectivity, internal resources

sub_categories.label: Internet not working
sub_categories.description: Complete loss of internet access, can't browse any websites

sub_categories.label: VPN not connecting
sub_categories.description: VPN client won't connect, VPN errors, can't establish VPN tunnel

sub_categories.label: WiFi dropping out
sub_categories.description: WiFi connection intermittent, keeps disconnecting and reconnecting

sub_categories.label: Can't access internal resources
sub_categories.description: Can't reach internal servers, intranet, or network drives while internet works fine

sub_categories.label: Website/service unreachable
sub_categories.description: A specific website or cloud service isn't loading while everything else works
